Find Internal Linking Opportunities for your Website in One Click & Boost SEO

Internal linking is crucial for good SEO, but it can be a time-consuming nightmare the more content you produce. That's where Internal Links by SEOwind comes in! Our Chrome plugin analyzes your content and suggests the perfect internal links in just one click, saving you hours and boosting your website's ranking potential.
Why Internal Links SEOwind Plugin?
üí™ Effortless Link Discovery: Find the perfect internal links to improve your website's ranking and user flow, all with a single click.
ü™Ñ Simple One-Click Magic: Just navigate to any page, click, and watch SEOwind generate a list of perfect linking opportunities.
‚úÖ Works on Any CMS: No matter what platform your website uses, Internal Links SEOwind has you covered. 
How it Works (Simple as 1-2-3!)
1. Quick Setup: Connect your domain's Google Search Console for seamless operation. Give us 30 seconds to pull the data for you.
2. One-Click Analysis: Navigate to a page and click for instant internal linking suggestions.
3. Link & Dominate: The plugin provides contextually relevant suggestions with anchor text. Simply copy and paste the link into your webpage!
Who Needs Internal Links SEOwind?
- Anyone Who Wants Higher Rankings: Boost your website's SEO with strategic internal linking.
- SEOs and Online Marketers: Save time and effort with our intelligent linking suggestions.
- Website Owners of All Sizes: Improve your website's structure and navigation for better user experience.

About us:
Internal Links is part of SEOwind's suite of Content Intelligence Tools, designed to help you dominate search engines. The SEOwind team also runs an SEO content agency.

Pricing & support:
Start with the free version, which includes 20 scans per month.
